https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1PC3Jrl4FHdrSq5h5gQHMriOsGe.jpg A young widow, Senora Paloma Ruiz, is perversely ambushed by Colonel Blanca, the very man who orchestrated the torture of her husband during Argentina's notorious 'Dirty War'. A Private Act
